body:
I guess the title basically says it all but I'll shed some light on what your suppoused to do :)

     So essentially what you do is you create a consecutive list of ways you can get banned off Avicus. This is all good-natured ,not to troll, and please make sure your "Way to get banned off Avicus" is appropriate. 

     Make sure you continue the list without any interruptions and don't forget to place the next number in the list before your statement! Here's mine...

1) Take Jozzeh's noodles :P
